item.title: Privacy Policy
item.description: Privacy Policy Last Updated: December 2, 2024 BetMax Action (“we,” “us,” or “our”) operates Bet Max Tourney. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you use our tournament betting platform. 1. Information We Collect 1.1 Personal Information We collect personal information that you provide directly to us, including: Name and contact information (email address, phone number) Account credentials (username, password) Payment information (credit card details, bank account information) Government-issued identification (for verification purposes) Date of birth and age verification data Location and geographic information 1.

item.title: Terms & Conditions
item.description: Terms & Conditions Last Updated: December 2, 2024 Welcome to Bet Max Tourney, a tournament betting platform operated by BetMax Action. By accessing or using our platform, you agree to be bound by these Terms and Conditions. 1. Acceptance of Terms By creating an account or using Bet Max Tourney services, you acknowledge that you have read, understood, and agree to be bound by these Terms and Conditions, as well as our Privacy Policy.
